body:
Since `last_char_was_a_delimiter` was initialized to `true`, we won't ever hit this `result->size() == 0` condition, right? (because the first character will be added to `result` in the `else if (last_char_was_a_delimiter)` block).

If so, seems like this condition can be removed?
